languages.text: Вас похитили ради выкупа, и пленители измывались над вами до самого освобождения.
You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.
languages.original_text: Вас похитили ради выкупа, и пленители измывались над вами до самого освобождения.

traits.locale_text: You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you until the moment you were released.
You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you until the moment you were released.
You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.
You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.
You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.

languages.text: Vous avez fait l'objet d'un enlèvement avec rançon et vous avez été {mf|maltraité|maltraitée} par vos ravisseurs jusqu'à votre libération.
languages.original_text: You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez fait l'objet d'un enlèvement avec rançon et vous avez été {mf|maltraité|maltraitée} par vos ravisseurs jusqu'à votre libération.

languages.text: Te secuestraron para pedir el rescate y tus captores te maltrataron hasta el mismo momento de tu liberación.
languages.original_text: You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.

traits.locale_text: Te secuestraron para pedir el rescate y tus captores te maltrataron hasta el mismo momento de tu liberación.

languages.text: あなたは身代金目的で誘拐され、解放される瞬間まで誘拐犯に虐げられ続けた。
languages.original_text: You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.

traits.locale_text: あなたは身代金目的で誘拐され、解放される瞬間まで誘拐犯に虐げられ続けた。

languages.text: 你曾遭到绑架。在勒索赎金期间，绑架你的人一直在虐待你，直到你被释放为止。
languages.original_text: You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.

traits.locale_text: 你曾遭到绑架。在勒索赎金期间，绑架你的人一直在虐待你，直到你被释放为止。

languages.text: Du wurdest entführt, um Lösegeld zu erpressen, und deine Häscher haben dich bis zu deiner Freilassung schlecht behandelt.
languages.original_text: You were kidnapped for ransom, and your captors mistreated you up until the moment you were released.

traits.locale_text: Du wurdest entführt, um Lösegeld zu erpressen, und deine Häscher haben dich bis zu deiner Freilassung schlecht behandelt.
